issue.title: Adding directory to GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH causes shader lib not to be found

content.raw:
@scpeters I do not know if it is directly related, but that is exactly the message that you get if something went 
wrong in the value of `GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH`, see [1] and [2]. 

[1] : #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/1607/gazebo-does-not-start-if-the

[2] : http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/5516/error-rtshadersystemcc408-unable-to-find-shader-lib/
